program: Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering (MS)

sections.text: The Stanford ME MS builds depth in mechanical engineering with a customizable program that prepares students for advanced practice or doctoral study.

items: At least 15 units of 200‑level ME lecture courses
Approved plan of study with faculty adviser
sections.text: Students complete graduate‑level ME coursework with advising; some pursue the Engineer degree for additional specialization.

items: BS in engineering, physics, or comparable science field expected
Submission of all application materials by the deadline
Meet departmental unit and distribution policies
sections.text: Applicants should have appropriate undergraduate preparation and submit a complete application; degree progress follows Bulletin rules.
Graduates enter roles in product design, energy, robotics, biomechanics, and R&D, or continue to PhD programs.
